title: Cute Wish
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>May my allowance go up, may my allowance go up....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Huh? Yoshiko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Uwaaah!? No-, Nozomi?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Did you come to visit the shrine? Thank you~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Y-, yeah. I figured I was close by, so. Also, it’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, you’re right, Yohane-chan. So, what did you wish for?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>T-, that’s not something you should just say to others!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I guess that’s also true. Oh yeah, why don’t you get a charm then? They say that if you write your wish on a strip of paper and put it inside a charm’s sleeve, it’ll come true.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh!? It works like that!? I want one!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I hope your cute little wish will come true♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
